description: Download an organization invoices batch PDF file
permissions: Requires access to the related organization invoices batch via the PDF generation relationship; non-admin users must be in the policy scope for that batch (broker members or manager members of the batch organization), while admins are allowed.
side_effects: Downloads a PDF to disk or writes to stdout when --output is - .
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. If --output is omitted, the filename comes from Content-Disposition or defaults to organization-invoices-batch-pdf-file-<id>.pdf. When --overwrite is false, the command fails if the output file already exists.

flags.name: --output
flags.description: Output file path (default: use server filename)
flags.validation: Use - to stream to stdout; e.g. ./invoice.pdf

flags.name: --overwrite
flags.validation: If false, the command errors when the output path already exists.
